name: Merge & Conquer: Battle Games
description:
Indulge in an innovative strategy where the development of the base is made through merging equal items with each other.
The game does not require waiting, just merge two items together and the upgrade will be complete instantly!
After Zombie Apocalypse the world is on the edge of the abyss, and only you can restore it again.
Develop your base by constructing new buildings and explore forbidden territories.
